Special permit required (4 days: 25  for  visitors, 35  for non-Orthodox visitors, 18  for students). There is a visitors' quota: maximum 100  and 10 non-Orthodox per day and women are not allowed.

vr.name: India
vr.note: Protected Area Permit (PAP) required for all of , ,  and parts of ,  and . Restricted Area Permit (RAP) required for all of  and  and parts of . Some of these requirements are occasionally lifted for a year.
